General.Name: Gujarat Raffia Industries Limited
General.Description: Gujarat Raffia Industries Limited manufactures and sells polyethylene tarpaulins, high density polyethylene (HDPE)/polypropylene (PP) woven sacks, and fabrics in India. It also offers PE tarpaulins, plastic and ground sheeting, geomembranes, tents, shelters, pond and canal linings, fumigation covers, HDPE and PP woven bags, azolla beds, grow bags, weed mats, vermibed and ropes, etc. It exports its products worldwide. Gujarat Raffia Industries Limited was incorporated in 1984 and is based in Gandhinagar, India.
